title: Google Photos blur option is not working after factory reset on both pixel1 and pixel 3axl
content: I have both pixel1 and pixel 3axl since 18 July I factory reset both pixel1 and pixel 3axl after factory reset I notice the Google photos blur feature is not working on both phones after this I ask my friend who have pixel1xl  on his phone the blue feature is working how I can get this feature again in my pixel1and 3axl . I try to update and download some older version of Google photos but nothing happens please help me....
